Please retake the test.

invalidReasons.tooFast: The test was completed too quickly.
invalidReasons.sameAnswer: Too many identical answers were submitted.

error.koreanNameLength: Korean name must be within 20 characters.
error.koreanNameFormat: Korean names must be in Korean only.
error.lastNameLength: Last name must be within 8 characters.
error.firstNameLength: First name must be within 15 characters.
error.englishNameFormat: English names must be in English letters only.

main.subtitle: Mensa-Style IQ Test
main.description4: Reflects the latest 2025 IQ test question types

section1.title: What is the BrainBrain IQ Test?
section1.subtitle:
BrainBrain provides test result analysis and feedback through a variety of question types and difficulties.
This allows you to identify your strengths and areas for improvement, and also presents comparative analysis by age and country.
Furthermore, your personal information is strictly protected, and all data is managed securely.

description1.title: Reliable and Accurate Results
description1.content: BrainBrain provides accurate and reliable results. Based on analysis of various IQ test types, we ensure that all users can obtain a trustworthy IQ score.

description2.title: Personalized Analysis
description2.content: Beyond just a score, we offer a detailed analysis of your test results. You can identify your strengths and areas needing improvement in each category to better understand your intelligence quotient.

description3.title: Convenient Online Access
description3.content: BrainBrain is easily accessible anytime, anywhere with an internet connection. You can take the test at your convenience, without being constrained by time or place.

section2.title: IQ Score Distribution
section2.subtitle:
The Intelligence Quotient (IQ) is a numerical value representing a person's cognitive abilities and is a psychological indicator that measures logical thinking, problem-solving, memory, and reasoning skills.
IQ is influenced by both genetic and environmental factors and should be interpreted not as a simple number but as one indicator of overall cognitive ability.

test.question: Question
test.confirmSubmit: Are you sure you want to submit the test?
test.confirmSubmitDescription: You cannot change your answers after submission.

warning.title: Test Instructions
warning.description: Please check the following before you begin the test.

rules.timeLimit: The test consists of 42 questions with a time limit of 40 minutes.
rules.allQuestions: You must answer all questions to see your results.
rules.noPageLeave: Leaving the page will stop the test, and your progress will not be saved.
rules.noRefresh: Do not close your browser or refresh the page during the test.

invalid.contactMessage: If the same problem persists despite normal test progression, please

result.title: IQ Test Results
result.description: This score is in the top {percent}%.

fail.title: Payment Failed
fail.description: An error occurred during payment processing. Please try again later.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: Brain Lab (hereinafter referred to as the "Company") values the personal information of its users in operating the BrainBrain service (hereinafter referred to as the "Service") and establishes and discloses the following privacy policy to protect personal information securely and process it lawfully in accordance with relevant laws.

article1.title: Article 1 (Personal Information Items Collected and Collection Methods)
article1.description: The Company collects the following personal information items.

items.title: Collected Items
items.personalInfo: Name, email address, gender, age, country
items.shipping: Shipping information (recipient's name, mobile phone number, address)

methods.title: Collection Methods
methods.directInput: Information directly entered by the user during the test or payment process
methods.paymentsInfo: Payment information received from the Payment Gateway (PG) company upon payment
methods.shippingInfo: Shipping address information entered by the user when requesting physical delivery

article2.title: Article 2 (Purpose of Collection and Use of Personal Information)
article2.description: The Company uses the collected personal information for the following purposes.

purposes.certificate: To create certificates and reports based on IQ test results
purposes.support: To respond to user inquiries and provide service-related notices
purposes.shipping: To ship and manage the delivery of physical certificates

article3.title: Article 3 (Retention and Use Period of Personal Information)
article3.description: In principle, the Company destroys the user's personal information without delay after the purpose of its collection and use has been achieved. However, in the following cases, the information is retained for the specified period.

retention.items: Items to be retained: Name, email, gender, age group, country, score, payment history
retention.period: Retention period: 5 years from the date of collection or until the user requests deletion
retention.payments: Payment/transaction information: Retained for 5 years in accordance with relevant laws such as the E-commerce Act
retention.shipping: Shipping information (recipient's name, mobile phone number, address): Retained for 5 years in accordance with relevant laws such as the E-commerce Act
retention.others: Other items (name, email, gender, age group, country, score): Retained for 2 years from the date of collection or until the user requests deletion

article4.title: Article 4 (Provision of Personal Information to Third Parties)
article4.description: The Company does not provide users' personal information to third parties. However, exceptions may be made in cases where there is a request based on relevant laws.

article5.title: Article 5 (Entrustment of Personal Information Processing)
article5.description: The Company entrusts some of its operations to external parties as follows and manages and supervises the entrusted companies to ensure compliance with the Personal Information Protection Act.

table.emailTask: Email transmission (user information not included; only certificate and report files are attached)

article6.title: Article 6 (User's Rights and How to Exercise Them)
article6.description: The user may exercise the following rights with respect to the Company at any time.

rights.correction: Request for correction in case of errors

article6.contact: â» These rights can be exercised via email (ð© brainbrainsite@gmail.com), and the Company will take action without delay.

article7.title: Article 7 (Installation, Operation, and Refusal of Automatic Personal Information Collection Devices)
article7.description: The Company does not use cookies or web analytics tools (such as Google Analytics).

article8.title: Article 8 (Measures to Ensure the Security of Personal Information)
article8.description: In accordance with Article 29 of the Personal Information Protection Act, the Company takes the following measures necessary to ensure security.

article9.title: Article 9 (Chief Privacy Officer)
article9.description: The Company has designated a Chief Privacy Officer who is responsible for overseeing all personal information processing tasks and handling inquiries and complaints from data subjects.

article10.title: Article 10 (Changes to the Privacy Policy)
article10.description: This privacy policy may be changed in accordance with laws and internal operating policies. Any changes will be announced in advance through service notices or email.

service.title: Terms of Service
service.introduction: These terms and conditions (hereinafter referred to as "Terms") aim to define the rights, obligations, and responsibilities between Brain Lab (hereinafter referred to as the "Company") and the user in connection with the use of the BrainBrain website (hereinafter referred to as the "Service").

article1.title: Article 1 (Purpose)
article1.description: The purpose of these Terms is to stipulate the conditions and procedures for using the services provided by the Company, such as IQ tests, issuance of result reports and certificates, and delivery of physical certificates, as well as the rights, obligations, and other necessary matters.

definitions.user: "User" refers to a person who accesses the Service and uses the services in accordance with these Terms.
definitions.payments: "Payment" refers to the act of a User paying a certain amount to the Company to use paid services.
definitions.content: "Content" refers to all materials provided by the Company within the Service, including text, images, reports, and certificates.
definitions.shipping: "Shipping Service" refers to the service where the Company produces a physical certificate and delivers it to the User via courier or other methods.

effectiveness.notice: These Terms shall take effect by being posted on the service screen or by other means of notification.
effectiveness.changes: The Company may amend these Terms to the extent that it does not violate relevant laws, and the amended Terms will be announced with the effective date and reason.
effectiveness.disagreement: If the User does not agree to the amended Terms, they may cease using the Service.

article4.title: Article 4 (Provision of Service)

services.title: The Company provides the following services:
services.report: Creating and emailing personalized reports and certificates

article4.changeNotice: The Company may change or suspend all or part of the Service for reasons such as service improvement, policy changes, or technical issues, and will provide prior notice in such cases.
article4.freeService: The Company shall not be liable for any damages related to services provided free of charge, unless there are special provisions in the law.

payments.paidContent: Some content in this Service is provided for a fee, and Users can use paid content through payment.
payments.process: Payments are processed through NicePayments (PG), and the User must fully check the amount and conditions presented at the time of payment.
payments.nonRefundable: Due to the nature of digital content, withdrawal of subscription under Article 17 of the E-commerce Act is restricted after the report/certificate has been issued.
payments.exceptions: However, refunds are possible in accordance with relevant laws if there is a cause attributable to the Company, such as service failure or critical errors.

article6.title: Article 6 (Refunds and Withdrawal of Subscription)
article6.revocation: The User may request to withdraw their subscription within 7 days from the date of payment as stipulated by relevant laws such as the E-commerce Act.

irrevocable.title: However, withdrawal of subscription is restricted in the following cases:
irrevocable.alreadyPrinted: If digital content such as reports or certificates has already been issued or downloaded.
irrevocable.nonReplicable: If the content is custom-made for the user, such as a personalized certificate, and cannot be replicated.
irrevocable.inLaw: In other cases specified by law.

article6.process: If a reason for a refund occurs, the Company will process it in accordance with the E-commerce Act and the Content Industry Promotion Act.

article7.title: Article 7 (User's Obligations)
article7.userResponsibility: The User shall not engage in the following acts:
article7.personalInformationMisuse: Illegally using or misappropriating another person's personal information.
article7.obstruction: Interfering with the operation of the service (including use of automated programs, hacking, etc.).
article7.infringeIP: Infringing on the Company's copyrights or intellectual property rights.
article7.violateLaw: Engaging in any act that violates laws or these Terms.

article8.title: Article 8 (Intellectual Property Rights)
article8.companyRights: Copyrights and other intellectual property rights for the Service and Content belong to the Company.
article8.userRestrictions: The User may not copy, transmit, distribute, sell, rent, or adapt the Content without the prior consent of the Company.
article8.reviewCopyright: The copyright for reviews written by the User belongs to the respective author, but the Company may use them for service operation and promotional purposes.

article9.title: Article 9 (Personal Information Protection)
article9.protectionPolicy: The Company manages the User's personal information obtained in connection with the provision of the Service in accordance with relevant laws such as the Personal Information Protection Act, and specific details are subject to the Privacy Policy.

article10.title: Article 10 (Service Interruption and Disclaimer)
article10.forceMajeure: The Company is not responsible for service interruptions due to force majeure events such as natural disasters, war, terrorism, fire, power outages, or communication failures.
article10.userFault: The Company is not responsible for service usage obstacles caused by the User's fault.
article10.freeServiceLiability: For services provided free of charge, the Company is not liable unless there is intentional or gross negligence on the part of the Company.

article11.title: Article 11 (Dispute Resolution and Governing Law)
article11.resolutionPrinciple: Disputes arising between the Company and the User shall be resolved amicably through mutual consultation as a principle.
article11.jurisdiction: If consultation fails, the laws of the Republic of Korea shall be the governing law, and the competent court under the Civil Procedure Act shall have exclusive jurisdiction.

addendum.title: Addendum
addendum.effectiveDate: These Terms shall be effective from September 10, 2025.
addendum.unspecifiedMatters: Matters not stipulated in these Terms shall be governed by relevant laws and commercial practices, including the E-commerce Act, the Content Industry Promotion Act, and the Personal Information Protection Act.
